biotools.summary: Python program written to locate microsatellite (SSR, VNTR, &c) repeats within fasta-formatted sequence or consensus files. msatcommander will search for all di-, tri-, tetra-, penta-, and hexa-nucleotide repeats (with options to search for fewer repeat types and combinations of repeat types).

bioschemas.name: msatcommander
bioschemas.summary: Python program written to locate microsatellite (SSR, VNTR, &c) repeats within fasta-formatted sequence or consensus files. msatcommander will search for all di-, tri-, tetra-, penta-, and hexa-nucleotide repeats (with options to search for fewer repeat types and combinations of repeat types).
